DOC.brief_summary: Blood samples on persons with cancer will be sampled for angiogenic, metastatic and coagulation proteins.
DOC.brief_title: Platelet Modulation: A Study of Angiogenic and Coagulation Proteins in Patients With Cancer
DOC.criteria: Patients with a diagnosis of malignancy Patients taking aspirin, NSAIDs, warfarin or platelet inhibitor therapy
